title: GDG DevFest 2016 Announced
brief: Hamburg Google Developers Groups are proud to announce the third annual GDG DevFest 2016 carefully crafted by GDG community! The event will take place on **14-15th of October** at the **Mindspace Hamburg**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG DevFest Hamburg 2016 announced! The 3th edition of the conference about Google technologies in Hamburg will take on **October 14-15** at the **mindspace Hamburg**. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1Zpbw7yVhtcUxwx6xLSPe99k4NiF8qpBr59HUFdFRkCk/edit).
